nodes.text: Nho Vantes was a paranoid black market merchant who was active in the Anoat sector during the Galactic Civil War. Several months into the Iron Blockade, Vantes became terrified that he might have been targeted by the Kouhun, a secretive order of assassins, and he offered them a bribe in valuable crystals in exchange for his safety. Although the assassins had in fact not targeted Vantes, they still decided to collect his bribe.
A young smuggler allied with the Kouhun sent one of their crewmembers to fetch Vantes' crystals.
